articles.title: Two largest marsquakes to date recorded from planet's far side - Phys.org
articles.description: The seismometer placed on Mars by NASA's InSight lander has recorded its two largest seismic events to date: a magnitude 4.2 and a magnitude 4.1 marsquake. The pair are the first recorded events to occur on the planet's far side from the lander and are five t…

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Secret of how rare spider fossils formed has been unlocked by scientists - CNN International
articles.description: The spiders were coated in microalgae, which produced a substance that protected the 22.5 million-year-old creepy-crawlies from the ravages of time.
